backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a per-user notes app with CRUD operations, user profiles, blob storage, and access control via authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (image encryption, hidden thumbnails, decryption UI, form editing) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose and notable recent changes of each module.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that handles Internet Identity authentication, forces dark mode, guards profile setup, and renders either the login screen or the notes dashboard.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenImageM: Portal-based full-screen image viewer with capture-phase Escape handling and pointer event isolation to prevent click-through to underlying modals.
frontend/src/components/NoteCard.tsx: Note card component showing title, content preview or encrypted ciphertext, timestamp, and edit/delete actions; hides image count badges for encrypted notes.
Modal component for viewing a note's details, supporting password-based decryption of encrypted notes, image viewing, deletion, and navigation to the edit form.
frontend/src/components/NoteFormModal.ts: Modal form for creating or editing notes, with support for encryption, image attachments, text file import, and pre-populated decrypted content when editing encrypted notes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name and create a profile on first use of the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting notes via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the authenticated caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines dark-mode CSS custom properties for the design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Full-page login screen displaying the app logo and a Sign In button that triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/screens/NotesDashboard.tsx: Main dashboard screen displaying a searchable grid of notes with modals for creating, viewing, and editing notes, plus a logout button in the header.
frontend/src/utils/cryptoNotes.ts: Provides AES-GCM password-based encryption/decryption utilities for both text content and raw image bytes using PBKDF2 key derivation via the Web Crypto API.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachments.ts: Validates image file type (JPEG/PNG/GIF) and size (max 10MB), and provides a helper to generate a base64 data URL preview from a File object.
frontend/src/utils/noteSearch.ts: Exports a single `filterNotes` function that filters a list of notes by matching a query string against note titles and content (case-insensitive).
frontend/src/utils/safeErrorReason.ts: Extracts a short, user-friendly error message from unknown error values, normalizing common patterns like network errors, timeouts, and permission issues.
frontend/src/utils/txtImport.ts: Reads a `.txt` file using FileReader and returns its text content as a string, rejecting non-text files.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radius variables, Inter font, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state for an encrypted notes app, listing completed features (image encryption/decryption in cryptoNotes, NoteCard, NoteDetailModal, NoteFormModal) and a pending feature request to encrypt images alongside text.
